Absolutely beautiful! On a clear day you can see Mexico. So peaceful to just walk around and enjoy seeing the islands off the coast.
The views are amazing. Worth the small drive up. There are stairs throughout, so it is not handicapped accessible . Climb up to the top, and look for Mexico!
Can see all the way to the ocean and the islands on a clear day. Great place just to sit and meditate.
